channel.title: 17th Workshop on Virtualization in High-Performance Cloud Computing
channel.description: Recent content on 17th Workshop on Virtualization in High-Performance Cloud Computing

item.description: VHPC 2022 Tentative Program (schedule to be defined soon) Keynote Talks “rtla: finding the sources of OS noise on Linux", Daniel Bristot De Oliveira, Senior Principal Software Engineer in the real-time kernel team at Red Hat. “DynamoDB: NoSQL database services for predictable HPC workloads", Akshat Vig, Principal Software Engineer at AWS and Amit Purohit, Director of Database Services at AWS. Accepted Paper Presentations “eBPF-based Extensible Paravirtualization,” Luigi Leonardi, Giuseppe Lettieri, Giacomo Pellicci (University of Pisa) High performance applications usually need to give many hints to the OS kernel regarding their needs.
